attributes.action: Allow Geert Wilders entry into Britain and issue a public apology to him and the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK we have Freedom of Speech, we cannot have one rule for Islam and another for other religions.  People should not be afraid to stand up and say negative things about Islam without fearing for their lifes. Countless brave people have risked their lifes to expose Islam and only for our own governments to turn their back on them. If Islam is peaceful, there will no problem in the UK, your refusal to allow entry only shows otherwise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
